headline: Why The Narrative Around TAT Technologies Is Shifting Amid Margin Gains And A Tempered Outlook
summary: TAT Technologies latest price target update keeps its fair value estimate steady at about $49 per share, even as the discount rate edges up from roughly 9.39% to around 9.47% amid a slightly higher perceived risk backdrop. Analysts see resilient revenue growth of about 16.20% as validation that the company is still executing well on its long term growth story, despite more cautious assumptions around certain programs. Read on to see how this evolving narrative could impact future price target...
